317049,February,"Bright apt, large verandah, central & near metro!","This is just the right thing for your stay in Athens--a penthouse studio apartment, centrally-located, 7 minutes from the metro!  The large, sunny terrace provides the perfect backdrop (and view) for your outdoor dining, cocktails and star-gazing! The perfect place for your stay in Athens! The main room has a double bed (it's a real bed!), is otherwise simply furnished, with internet connection at a small desk for your use.  It's very bright, and French doors lead to a large balcony with table and chairs--a perfect spot for your morning coffee, or romantic evening meals under the stars.   Essentials include an air conditioner and WIFI. 711554,February,By the hill,"My home is better described as a traditional Athenian house decorated with architectural elements from the beginning of the previous century. My family and I have been living in this house for more than 4 generations already and - as far as I can remember myself - it has always been open to everybody. Including you. :) My house has been the home of my family for the past four generations since it was built before the 1930s. Otherwise there are two options to get close to the house by the public transportation. The Blue line of the metro connects the airport with Kerameikos station, traveling for 40 min and costs 10€. 1085660,February,Stylish Apartment w/Acropolis Views,"Open the door to my home and the city is all around you.  The first thing you will notice as you step out onto the large deck that wraps around the apartment is the stunning view of the Acropolis and the Parthenon. Welcome to Athens!  I am a Greek photographer and I am in love with this beautiful Mediterranean city.   Come stay in my light-filled apartment with sweeping views of the Acropolis and I am sure you will be, too! Open the door to my home and the city is all around you.  The first thing you will notice as you step out onto the large deck that wraps around the apartment is the stunning view of the Acropolis and the Parthenon.   Day and night, the sight of the greatest monument in the western world will captivate you. Surrounding the Acropolis as far as your eyes can see is the mesmerizing urban landscape of Athens bordered on one side by mountains and the other by the sea. Pour yourself a glass of ouzo, relax, and soak in this very special atmosphere.    You are home. The apar","• You are just four minutes from Sygrou-Fix metro station and ten minutes away from the New Acropolis Museum and all the ancient sites of the acropolis.  Just beyond that is the Plaka - Monastiraki area with the famous Athens flea market, where you can have your lunch or dinner in the traditional taverns and have your ouzo in good company and atmosphere. From there you reach Ermou Street, the main shopping street of Athens, and historic Syntagma Square and the Parlimnt. 1215055,February,House at the Foothills of Acropolis,"On a regular summer day I used to sleep on the rooftop in a hammock, surrounded by the bougainvillea and lemon trees under the imposing rock of the Acropolis. In the winter, I played board games with my classmates by the fireplace. No doubt, I consider myself spoiled growing up a stone’s throw away from the Parthenon and the newly established Acropolis Museum. The cradle of democracy, the birth of theater and philosophy, temples and Byzantine churches, an Ottoman era mosque, bars, restaurants, cafes, monuments, ancient arches are all a few minutes stroll from my maternal house. History is everywhere and it is inescapable.  Yet, modern Athens has more to offer. The local flea market at Monastiraki, the meat, fish, and vegetable markets of Athinas Street, and lastly Ermou, the city’s main shopping street are all a mere 10 minutes walk away from the apartment. 1734269,February,9th Heaven,"""9th Heaven"" feels more like a bird's nest facing the sunrise every morning. This studio is a very special house. It is located in the historical neighborhood of Athens named Dourgouti which has been renovated right before the 2004 Olympic Games. The view from up there is absolutely amazing and all transportation leading to the city center (metro, tram and buses) is less than 5 min. walk away each. The studio looks at Mt. Hymettos (Imittos), the ""crazy-man"" as the old Athenians used to call it. The morning sun coming up from this mountain shines directly in the apartment making it super bright during the morning hours. You will stand above all the other buildings and be able to enjoy a full 180 degrees view of the eastern part of Athens. During summer you will appreciate the wind up there even better, I am sure.  The interior is a fairly equipped studio, clean and minimal. You can have your coffee from the machine or use the cooker to make a nice Greek coffee (it will be there - I 'll ","You can link to metro, tram, busses, trolleys, all in less than 5 minutes walk. 3433913,February,A Cozy Apt in Kolonaki of Athens,"If you need a bright and sunny place a breath away from Syntagma square then this apartment is the right choose for you!! Really modern is decorated with lots of excellent paintings from Greek artists. Located in Kolonaki area, with a unique designed, in a very peaceful neighborhood close to the Lycabettus hill.   The idea of the owner was to create a beautiful and comfortable Apartment, on the necessity for ameliorating the luxurious tourist services with an affordable price. It is very modern decorated, with lot of fine art paintings and fully furnished from very well known designers.
